title: Two raw lots for sale (includes Sov and Cycle)
author: t206hound

posts.post_title: Two raw lots for sale (includes Sov and Cycle)
posts.post_content:
Satisfaction guaranteed on both lots; if you want a larger scan, send me a PM.  I would take $225 for all ten cards.

Lot #1, six cards, $95 delivered:
Red Ames (Hands At Chest)SC150-30
Red Ames (Hands Above Head)OM
Jake AtzS350
Beals BeckerSC350-30
Larry Doyle (Portrait)OM
Deacon PhillippeP350

Lot #2, four cards, $140 delivered:
Al Bridwell (Portrait, With Cap)SC460-30
Danny HoffmanP350
Nick MaddoxC350
Rube Manning (Batting)P150
